design_philosophy.core_concept: The Dualverse: Cyberpunk Arcade vs. Pop-Art Comic
design_philosophy.emotional_tone: High-Energy, Immersive, Bold, Nostalgic yet Futuristic
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix retro arcade aesthetics with modern clean UI
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel 'punchy' or 'electric'
Contrast is King: Deep blacks vs. Neon (Gaming) and White vs. Primary Colors (Heroes)

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Syne' with font-weight 700 or 800. Tight tracking (-0.02em).
usage_rules.body: Use 'Outfit' for all readable text. High legibility.
usage_rules.ui_elements: Use 'Rajdhani' for stats, buttons, and technical data (gaming side).

layout_and_grid.spacing_system: Tailwind Scale (p-4, p-8, p-12, p-16, p-24)
layout_and_grid.container_rules: Max-width 1400px. Always use px-6 or px-8 on mobile.

buttons.base_style: px-8 py-3 rounded-full font-bold transition-all duration-300 transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.gaming_variant: bg-transparent border-2 border-cyan-400 text-cyan-400 hover:bg-cyan-400 hover:text-black shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(0,243,255,0.5)]
buttons.hero_variant: bg-red-600 text-white border-2 border-black shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] hover:translate-x-[2px] hover:translate-y-[2px] hover:shadow-none

cards.gaming_style: Glassmorphism: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 hover:border-cyan-400/50 transition-colors

inputs.style: h-12 bg-secondary/20 border-2 border-transparent focus:border-primary outline-none rounded-lg px-4 transition-all

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for UI icons. Use 'GameController' for games, 'Zap' for heroes.

animations.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }}

rules: Focus states must be visible (ring-2 ring-primary).
All images must have alt text.
Interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Install fonts in index.css using the import rule.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Configure tailwind.config.js to extend colors with the 'gaming' and 'hero' palettes.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create a 'ThemeContext' to manage the 'gaming' vs 'hero' mode (which maps to dark/light class).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Build the 'SplitScreen' landing page component first.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Implement the 'Card' component with a 'variant' prop (gaming/hero).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Ensure the 'Login/Register' forms use the specific input styles defined above.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for text unless it is a massive headline.
Avoid generic 'Inter' font. Use 'Syne' for personality.
Make sure the 'Hero' mode feels like a comic book (borders, hard shadows).
Make sure the 'Gaming' mode feels like a HUD (glows, transparency).
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
